Chapter Previous Next

class gstBT_Stack

Class to linearize the traversal of the gstBinTree. WARNING! This class does NOT check to see if it is exceeding its depth bounds. This is for speed. Be careful.

From header file: gstBinTree.h

Constructors and Destructors
gstBT_StackCtor.
~gstBT_StackDtor.
Functions
empty Is the stack empty?
init Initialize the stack by emptying it.
pop Pop top node off of stack, returning node and bounds.
push Push a new node and bounds onto the stack.
